synthesis_conditions.time: Stirring for 30 min at room temperature, then 2 h at 0 88C
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Washed with ice-water, then dried in air
synthesis_conditions.other_conditions: Sodium nitrite solution added while keeping temperature below 0 88C

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Washed with cold water (5 mL), then methanol (5 mL), and ethyl ether (10 mL)
